alert.note: Alert for Miami-Dade (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 6:50PM EDT until May 12 at 7:15PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 715 PM EDT FOR NORTHERN MIAMI-DADE COUNTY... At 650 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Doral to near Shark Valley Obs Tower, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Sweetwater, Westchester, Fountainbleau and Intersection Krome And Kendall Drive. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
